snippet: The Susan G. Komen foundation has taken sides in the abortion debate. And that's going to change the look of their ubiquitous pink ribbon.
abstract: The Susan G. Komen foundation has taken sides in the abortion debate. And that's going to change the look of their ubiquitous pink ribbon.
lead_paragraph: I know that political forces on the right are determined to restrict access to abortion and to vilify the legal procedure, even if it means diminishing the availability of other health services that help women and children. But, naively I suppose, I'm still shocked by the lengths they'll go to get their way.
